definition: head rope of a fishing net/guiding principle/key link/class (taxonomy)/outline/program
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: China published a national education plan for the next decade.
sentences.chinese: 中國日前發佈了未來10年教育規劃綱要。

sentences.english: His major work, Compendium der Psychiatrie, was first published in 1883.
sentences.chinese: 他的主要著作《精神病學綱要》初版於1883年。

sentences.english: Ursuline College of Languages Syllabus for the Fall Semester in …
sentences.chinese: 文藻外語學院九十學年度第二學期教學綱要。

sentences.english: We thoroughly implemented the Plan for Education Reform and Development.
sentences.chinese: 深入貫徹落實教育改革和發展規劃綱要。

sentences.english: From these specifics, you can then extract more general, solution-oriented needs statements like those in Table 2.
sentences.chinese: 從這些方面，你能夠摘取更多的綱要，如表2。

sentences.english: I drew up the plan for that campaign too, which was also known as the Nanjing-Shanghai-Hangzhou Campaign.
sentences.chinese: 渡江戰役也就是京滬杭戰役的實施綱要是我起草的。

sentences.english: Wenzao Ursuline College of Languages Syllabus for the Fall Semester in …
sentences.chinese: 文藻外語學院九十學年度第二學期教學綱要。

sentences.english: Here is a rundown of the projects and their current status. First, the players
sentences.chinese: 下面是該項目的綱要以及它們目前的狀態。

sentences.english: Suggested outlines of the content of an EIS and an EIR are provided.
sentences.chinese: 綱要提出的內容和環境信息服務提供了EIR。

sentences.english: Results from these brainstorming sessions were documented in a Method Sketch.
sentences.chinese: 這些自由討論的結果歸檔在方法綱要中。

sentences.english: American, British, Canadian, Australian Armies Standardization Program.
sentences.chinese: 美，英，加，澳軍隊標準化綱要。

sentences.english: First, establishing and improving organizational structures to provide organizational guarantee for the implementation of the NPA.
sentences.chinese: 第一，建立健全組織機構，爲實施綱要提供組織保證。

sentences.english: Synopses appear in the front of revisions or Flovas as a summary of contents.
sentences.chinese: 把綱要放在訂正或植物誌前面作爲內容摘要。

sentences.english: This skeleton schedule is your base.
sentences.chinese: 這個綱要時間表是您的基礎。

sentences.english: Read a compendium of published software architecture definitions.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀已發佈的軟件架構定義的綱要。

definition: (often used in book or chapter titles) general introduction/overview
first draft/to draw up (a first version)
to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
special administrative region/abbr. for 特別行政區|特别行政区
